short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RedWave: Audio Leveller ensures balanced web audio, clear dialogue, and softer loud effects for a seamless, comfortable watch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RedWave: Audio Leveller revolutionizes your online audio experience, guaranteeing smooth and uniform sound levels across all web content. Designed for media enthusiasts, remote professionals, students, gamers, and music lovers, RedWave eliminates the need for constant volume adjustments and the startling contrast between inaudible dialogue and sudden loud noises.

Key Features:

🔊 Dynamic Range Compression: Automatically evens out audio levels to prevent abrupt changes.

🎚 Custom Presets: Select from presets like Speech Clarity, Night Mode, Dynamic Range, and Loud Environment to suit your listening environment and preferences.

🖱 Easy Toggle: Quickly enable or disable DRC with just a click from your browser, giving you immediate control over your audio settings.

Great for:

🌜 Watching and Listening at Any Hour: Enjoy your favorite shows and videos any time, with Night Mode ensuring you won’t disturb others.

🗣 Clear Communication: In online meetings and lectures, Speech Clarity mode ensures every word is heard, making communication crisp and clear.

🎮 Immersive Gaming and Music: Get lost in your games and music without loud surprises or missing quiet moments.

With RedWave: Audio Leveller, embrace a world where your online audio is perfectly balanced, clear, and consistent. Say goodbye to the annoyance of fluctuating volumes and hello to a more enjoyable audio experience.

---- Currently In BETA -----

As we continue to refine and enhance RedWave, we're eager to hear from you. This extension is currently in beta, and your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve. Share your experiences, suggestions, and any issues you encounter — together, we can make RedWave even better.

🙏 Thank You: A huge thank you to all our users for embarking on this journey with us. Your support and feedback are what drive us forward.

🛠 Made by ZLWEST

Stay tuned for updates as we evolve, and thank you for being part of the RedWave community!
